dct_title_s: Italy 1:10,000. Monopoli city plan. Provisional G.S.G.S. 4380
dct_description_sm: Projection: Lambet Conical Orthomorphic; Spheroid: Bessel; Origin: 39°30ʹN. 14°E.; False Coordinates of Origin: 700,000 meters East, 600,000 meters North; Scale Factor: .99906. "114545." "3-43." Grid and projection approximate. Important buildings are named. Reprinted 1943 by A.M.S. AMS 1 Grid and projection approximate. "Copied from Italian map 1:500,000, Monopooli F 190 no. 1, 1914." United States. Army Map Service. Provisional G.S.G.S. no. 4380 United States. Army. Corps of Engineers [Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section. Provisional G.S.G.S. no. 4380]
dct_publisher_sm: Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, U.S. Army, 1943.
[London] : War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section, 1942.
